donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: To consolidate peace in Burundi by ensuring the continued adherence and support for the implementation of the 2006 Comprehensive Ceasefire Agreement signed by the Government of Burundi and "Front National de Libération"(FNL)

project_descr: Appuie au dialogue politique, prealable pour que les elections de 2010 puissent se derouler dans un climat paisible.
